OwnershipTransferred(address,address).details: This emits when ownership of a contract changes.

transferOwnership(address).details: Set _newOwner to address(0) to renounce any ownership.

params._newOwner: The address of the new owner of the contract

documentation.text:
@title ERC-173 Contract Ownership Standard
  Note: the ERC-165 identifier for this interface is 0x7f5828d0
@dev This emits when ownership of a contract changes.

@notice Get the address of the owner
 @return owner_ The address of the owner.
The EIP-165 identifier of this interface is 0xf4cedd5a
